Daemos smiled back. His grin, however, semmed devilish...

Daemos: Great! Now, while Anachronox installs the shield generator and 
that Jetstorm plants the seeds, I would like to meet the warrior who 
will be reformatted.

Jetstorm hear his commander and walks over to the crate, pulling a 
compartment containing blue, circuited seeds.

Jetstorm: (mumbling) And I wanted some freaking combat... stupid 
preds... you just don't know when an invasion is coming... maybe 
they'll want to test out their reformatted bodies, though... (he 
raises his head) Hey, Anachrononx, how about we teach those 
reformatted preds what it's like to be techno-organic?

He starts putting the seeds in the soil.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> 
>  Kali:
> Kali smiled and took Deamos' hand
>   warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: Daemos: Then, let us 
welcome our friendship!
> 
> He offered his hand.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > 
> >  Kali:
> > "Agree..."answered Kali
> >  
> >   warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: Daemos: Our readings 
> have shown that energon concentration in the soil 
> > is higher right here, where we stand. We want to plant the orchard 
> > here. Do you agree?
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > > 
> > >  Kali
> > > "It's good..."Kali "Where will you built that out post???? How 
> many 
> > miles will be that of Black Fortress?"
> > >   warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: Daemos: Mmm... That 
> is 
> > a good question. In exchange for your 
> > > hospitality on your territory, I and Prophetus will reformat two 
> of 
> > > your soldiers. They will have greater reflexes, a body built for 
> > > battle and a mind focussed on combat. What do you say?
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> wrote:
> > > > 
> > > >  Kali:
> > > > "What can you offer to BlackForttres' Predacons?" said Kali 
> > > >   warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: Prophetus: It is 
> > quite 
> > > simple actually. We just have to leave a small 
> > > > shield generator to protect them. This soil is very fertile, 
and 
> > > that 
> > > > is why we want to plant here.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> > > > > 
> > > > >  kALI:
> > > > > Kalilooked arround and saw the death valley and looking back 
> > > towards 
> > > > Daemos"How can your techno-organic plants can grow up in a 
place 
> > > like 
> > > > this... The nearest volcano can destroy them... "
> > > > >   warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: Daemos: Oh, but 
> > maybe 
> > > > more than you can suspect. As the Tripredacus 
> > > > > Commander, I agree to the pact, and I ask of you that you 
> allow 
> > me 
> > > > and 
> > > > > my group to establish an outpost on this site. It will serve 
> > only 
> > > to 
> > > > > grow techno-organic plants. Once the plant have reached 
> > maturity, 
> > > we 
> > > > > will harvest them and leave this place. Does this suit you?
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > > > > 
> > > > > >  Kali::
> > > > > > "We offer you an non agression pact" said Kali"and help if 
a 
> > > > faction 
> > > > > named infecticons attack... I guess that you have heard 
about 
> > > > them..."
> > > > > >   warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: Prophetus 
> smiled 
> > > > > inside. The discussion was starting to head in the 
> > > > > > way he wanted it to.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Prophetus: I have had wind of this. Tell me more, Kali.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Daemos landed a few meters from there.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Daemos: Yes, tell us more. The only thing we want here is 
> some 
> > > > place 
> > > > > > for us to make an orchard. I assume that is a small price 
to 
> > pay 
> > > > to 
> > > > > > conclude an Alliance...
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Jetstorm seemed disappointed not to fight, but he 
contained 
> > > > himself. 
> > > > > > Maybe the Predacons would accept a challenge to celebrate 
> this 
> > > > > > alliance...
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Airshadow Nightlight <airly2000@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Kali::
> > > > > > > Kali smiled, she knew that Prophetus  could kill her if 
he 
> > > > > liked... 
> > > > > > but he didn't know that she had a lot little tricks if she 
> > > needed 
> > > > > > them.
> > > > > > > Kali did her best smiled and said kindly "I guess, lord 
> > > > Prophetus, 
> > > > > > that you know that my brother Shivah wants do an alliance 
> with 
> > > > > > Tripedocus..."
> > > > > > >   warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote: Prophetus 
had 
> a 
> > > > grin 
> > > > > on 
> > > > > > his face. The towering giant could easily 
> > > > > > > crush his opponent, yet she seemed to defy him openly. 
She 
> > was 
> > > > > > > brave... foolish, but very brave...
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Prophetus: I assume our presence was not unannounced. I 
am 
> > > > > > Prophetus, 
> > > > > > > and I lead the Tripredacus until Daemos arrives.
> > > > > > >

<airly2000@y...> 
> > > wrote:
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > >  Kali:::
> > > > > > > > Kali landed and looked to the tripedocus' force, she 
> > smiled 
> > > > and 
> > > > > > said 
> > > > > > > "The Tripedocus, I guess... "
> > > > > > > >   x_rauq_x <x_rauq_x@y...> wrote: -- Anachronox --
> > > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > > Anachronox growls, obviously wanting to get into a 
scrap 
> > > > > > > > today. "Arrr, alright... I won't attack unless you 
give 
> > the 
> > > > > > order." 
> > > > > > > > He arms himself. <Just make one false moves ya 
> > slagheap...> 
> > > He 
> > > > > > > > thinks to himself as he absent mindedly plays with a 
> > spear, 
> > > > > > twirling 
> > > > > > > > around his finger.
> > > > > > > >

> > > > > > > > neighbour is
